logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?
logoutSubMessage: You'll need to sign in again to access your account.
provideDetailedReason: Please provide a detailed reason (at least 10 characters)
ensureExactAmount: Please ensure you have the exact amount ready after the appointment for payment.
pincodeAddressSaved: Your pincode and address have been saved successfully
cancelServiceDescription: Please provide a reason for cancelling this service. The provider will be notified.
locationNote: We'll use this location to help you find nearby doctors and provide better service.
enterPincodeDescription: Enter your pincode to help us provide better service. You can also try auto-detecting your location.
pincodeMustBeAtLeast4Digits: Pincode must be at least 4 digits
pleaseLoginToSavePincode: Please login to save your pincode
failedToSavePincode: Failed to save pincode. Please try again.
locationPermissionDeniedMessage: Location permission was denied. Please enable it in Settings to auto-detect your pincode, or enter it manually.
locationPermissionRequiredMessage: Location permission is required to auto-detect your pincode. Please enable it or enter pincode manually.
detectedPincode: Detected pincode: {pincode}. Click Save to confirm.
couldNotDetectPincode: Could not detect pincode. Please enter it manually.
couldNotDetectLocation: Could not detect your location. Please enter pincode manually.
locationServicesUnavailable: Location services are unavailable. Please enable location services or enter pincode manually.
locationDetectionTimeout: Location detection timed out. Please try again or enter pincode manually.
accountCreatedMessage: Your account has been created successfully. You can now proceed to select your role.
selectRoleToContinue: Please select your role to continue
phoneVerificationMessage: Please verify your phone number to request services. You can verify it in your profile settings.
authenticationErrorMessage: Please log out and sign in again to refresh your session.
accountErrorMessage: Unable to create your account. Please try again or contact support.
permissionErrorMessage: Unable to update your account. Please log out and sign in again.
verificationErrorMessage: Unable to verify your phone number status. Please try again or contact support.
addressRequiredMessage: Please select or add your address
scheduledDateRequiredMessage: Please select a date for scheduled service
invalidAddressMessage: Please select a valid address with pincode and address
invalidDateTimeMessage: Please select a date and time at least 1 hour in the future for scheduled service.
